WorkBC Employment Services Client Consen: WorkBC Employment Services Client Consent to Collect, Use and Disclose Information
firstHead: Personal information collected on this form is collected under the authority of section 26 (c) of the Freedom of Information and Protection of Privacy Act and is subject to all the provisions of that Act. The personal information collected will be used by the Ministry of Social Development and Poverty Reduction, its service providers and associates of its service providers to administer WorkBC Employment Services or WorkBC Assistive Technology Services, as applicable. If you have any questions about the collection of your personal information, please contact:
may need to collect, use and disclose my: may need to collect, use and disclose my personal information for the following purposes:
to determine whether I am eligible for t: to determine whether I am eligible for the WorkBC Employment Services
to determine what WorkBC Employment Serv: to determine what WorkBC Employment Services are appropriate for me; and
to provide WorkBC Employment service to: to provide WorkBC Employment service to me
